github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Follow the conventional commit message format.
Write the commit message in Spanish from Spain.
Write the commit message always in lower case, except with abbreviations, acronyms, or similar.
Limit the first line to 72 characters or fewer.
Follow the commit type 'refac' for code refactoring.
Follow the commit type 'fix' for bug fixes.
Follow the commit type 'feat' for new features.
Follow the commit type 'etc' if none applies.
Follow the commit scope 'documentation' if the change affects documentation (.md) files.
Follow the commit scope 'script' if the change affects shell (.sh) files.
